name: https://geospatial.sernanp.gob.pe/arcgis_server/rest/services
description: ArcGIS REST endpoint providing a catalog of geospatial services for SERNANP, the National Service of Natural Protected Areas of Peru. The service offers access to various layers and maps related to natural protected areas and related geospatial data.
owner_name: Servicio Nacional de Áreas Naturales Protegidas por el Estado (SERNANP)
